title: [Large-Scale] Science Classroom Creativity Assessment and Promotion Strategy Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Methodology for creativity assessment tool development, foundational science pedagogy, and project-based assessment design experience
context.additional_context: Learning to apply and analyze creativity assessment tools in a smartphone-based VR simulation environment.

learning_goals: Learners analyze a science classroom creativity assessment tool based on nine elements: cognitive/affective traits, class participation, classroom environment, teacher support, and individual/group creative behaviors.
Learners interpret creativity data collected in simulation environments and propose at least three personalized instructional design strategies.
Learners develop creativity-promoting instructional models through project-based assessment and improve them via peer evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
